body_html: I'm afraid w/o the fix it will segfault in backwards regardless of whether you use cudnn - to work around that use requires_grad=True for input. Cudnn is supposed to be faster for dilated convs, but performance greatly depends on the sizes, so always benchmark.

body: I'm afraid w/o the fix it will segfault in backwards regardless of whether you use cudnn - to work around that use requires_grad=True for input. Cudnn is supposed to be faster for dilated convs, but performance greatly depends on the sizes, so always benchmark.
